text: Reuben Louis Goodstein was an English mathematician who had a strong interest in philosophy and teaching mathematics. == Research == Reuben introduced a variant of the Ackermann function which is now called hyperoperation sequence, together with the naming system used for those (tetration, pentation, hexation, etc.).
